item.title: Democrat Abigail Spanberger leads GOP's Winsome Earle-Sears in Virginia governor race: Poll
item.description: Democrat Abigail Spanberger has a double-digit lead over Republican Winsome Earle-Sears in Virginia's governor's race, according to a recent poll.
